name: Dragon Empire Galaxy War Zone
description:
Dragon Empire Galaxy War Zone

Attack the castle by hordes of Dragons then rid them from your lands in this exciting 3D shooter game. Tap to blast the attacking dragons using your arsenal of weapons including; a Crossbow, bombs, fireballs and much more.

- 4 unique 3D levels to battle dragons in.
- Try and beat your last score and collect all of the achievements

For Android games: Our website games

For iOS only games Download at: Temple-Adventure-Runner 2018

More android and Apple games at: vamoose-game website
